coupon.sys.core.facade

Class CompanyFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • coupon.sys.core.facade.CompanyFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientFacade

    public class CompanyFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientFacade
    This class implements all the business logic associated with the company It has three attributes: one of type CompanyDao and the other of type couponDaoDB and a relevant company (since a company performs the actions)
    Author:
    Yehuda.Hizmi

      The constructor initialize the couponDaoDb and companyDaoDb and the company attributes

      • CompanyFacade

                     CompanyDao companyDaoDb,

    • Method Detail

      • createCoupon

        public void createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                  throws CouponSystemException
        This method activate the createCoupon method at the couponDaoDb class It gets a coupon object to create as a parameter. Since it is not possible to create two coupons with the same title. The method: 1.check if a coupon with the same title already exists in the system in case there is raise exception otherwise insert it
        Parameters:
        coupon - - the coupon to create
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message "Coupon title: [" + coupon.getTitle() + "] already exists in the system"

      • removeCoupon

        public void removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                  throws CouponSystemException
        This method activate the removerCoupon at the couponDaoDB class. It gets a coupon object to delete as a parameter. this method check it the coupon the company asks to delete actually belong to it by activating the isCopuonBelongsCompany method.
        Parameters:
        coupon - - the coupon that need to be deleted
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws two types of exceptions: "Coupon [Coupon title: " + coupon.getTitle() + "] doesn't belong to " + this.company.getCompName() + " company" or "Coupon [Coupon name: " + coupon.getTitle() + "] doesn't exists in the system"

      • updateCoupon

        public void updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                  throws CouponSystemException
        This method activate the updateCoupon method at the couponDaoDB class. According to the business logic only the end date and the price can be updated. this method check it the coupon the company asks to update actually belong to it by activating the isCopuonBelongsCompany method.
        Parameters:
        coupon - - The coupon to be updated
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws two types of exceptions: "Coupon [Coupon title: " + coupon.getTitle() + "] doesn't belong to " + this.company.getCompName() + " company" or "Coupon [Coupon name: " + coupon.getTitle() + "] doesn't exists in the system"

      • viewCompanyInfromation

        public Company viewCompanyInfromation()
                               throws CouponSystemException
        This method return the logged in company information
        Returns:
        - The company that is logged in as an object
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - throws an exception that is has thrown from other methods

      • getCoupon

        public Coupon getCoupon(long coupon_id)
                 throws CouponSystemException
        This method activate the getCoupon(long id) at the couponDaoDB class. this method check it the coupon the company asks to get actually belong to it by activating the isCopuonBelongsCompany method.
        Parameters:
        coupon_id - - The coupon id that need to be returned
        Returns:
        - A coupon as an object
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws two types of exceptions: "Coupon [Coupon title: " + coupon.getTitle() + "] doesn't belong to " + this.company.getCompName() + " company" or "Coupon [Coupon name: " + coupon.getTitle() + "] doesn't exists in the system"

      • getAllCoupons

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllCoupons()
                                           throws CouponSystemException
        This method activate getAllCoupons(long id) method at couponDaoDB class.
        Returns:
        - a collection of all the coupons associated with the company
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message "There aren't any listed coupons in the system"

      • getCouponByType

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponByType(CouponType couponType)
                                             throws CouponSystemException
        This method activate getCouponByType(company,couponType) method at customerDaoDB class.
        Parameters:
        couponType - - The type of coupons that need to be returned
        Returns:
        - a collection of all the coupons associated with the company
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message "There aren't any listed coupons in the system"

      • getCouponByPrice

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponByPrice(double price)
                                              throws CouponSystemException
        This method activate getCouponsUpToPrice(company,price) method at customerDaoDB class.
        Parameters:
        price - - The price that the coupons are equal or less
        Returns:
        - a collection of all the coupons associated with the company
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message "There aren't any listed coupons with a price less than " + price + " in the system"

      • getCouponByDate

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponByDate(java.util.Date date)
                                             throws CouponSystemException
        This method activate getCouponsUpToDate(company,date) method at customerDaoDB class.
        Parameters:
        date - - The date that the coupons are equal or less
        Returns:
        - a collection of all the coupons associated with the company
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message "There aren't any listed coupons with an end date less than " + date + " in the system"
